Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Corpse
    Corpse class.
    CraftableWeaponItem
    A base class for weapons that are craftable.
    CraftWeaponAction
    An action that craft a new weapon from a CraftableWeaponItem object
    Crops
    A crop that can grow and ripens.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    DropDefreezeItemAction  
    EatingBehaviour
    A class that generates an EatingHealAction
    EatingHealAction
    Heal after Eating Action for Actors
    Farmer
    Class representing a sub-type of Human which is Farmer
    FarmingBehaviour
    An abstract class to act as parent class for all Farming- related Behaviour class
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    Fertilize Action for Actor to fertilize Crops.
    FertilizeBehaviour
    A class that generates FertilizeAction if the Actor stands on a Crop
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    Food which can be eaten by Humans and PLayers and restore their hitpoints.
    HarvestingAction
    Harvesting Action for Actor to harvest ripen crops
    HarvestingBehaviour
    A class that generates HarvestingAction
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    PickFreezeItemAction  
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PlayerEatingAction
    Eating Action specifically for Player
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    RipenCrops
    A ripen crop which can be harvest.
    SowCropAction
    Action for Sowing a Crop
    SowCropBehaviour
    A class that generates SowCropAction if Actor stands next to a patch of dirt with 33% probability
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieArm
    ZombieArm CraftableWeaponItem will be created when the Zombie's Arm is knocked off.Player can use it to craft a Zombie Club, as it is a subclass of CraftableWeaponItem.
    ZombieAttackAction
    An attack action class for the Zombie.
    ZombieClub
    Zombie Club is a weapon, can be crafted by using Zombie Arm.
    ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
    Class that represents a weapon for an unarmed Zombie
    ZombieLeg
    ZombieLeg CraftableWeaponItem will be created when the Zombie's Leg is knocked off.Player can use it to craft a Zombie Mace, as it is a subclass of CraftableWeaponItem.
    ZombieLimb
    Class to represent Zombie's Limb.
    ZombieMace
    Zombie Mace is a weapon that can be crafted by using Zombie Leg.

    Enum Description
    ZombieCapability
